org.eclipse.scada.hd.ui.data

Class ServiceQueryBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractPropertyChange
      • org.eclipse.scada.hd.ui.data.AbstractQueryBuffer
        • org.eclipse.scada.hd.ui.data.ServiceQueryBuffer

  • public class ServiceQueryBuffer
extends AbstractQueryBuffer
    A query buffer based on a tracked connection service

    The query buffer must the opened using the open() call.
